item.title: Creating a Blog with Hugo and Github in 30 minutes
item.description: You can start your own blog by using Hugo and Github in 30 minutes. Hugo is one of the worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites. This quick start uses macOS in the examples. Let’s start! Steps Install Hugo Create a site and add a theme Add Some Content Test your site locally Create two Github repositories Modify the config.toml file Build your site Deploy your site with GitHub Pages Deployment Automation!
